hooks.command: FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_ARG_FILE_PATH"; if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|mjs)$'; then npx eslint --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi

FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_ARG_FILE_PATH"; if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.env\.local$'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Do not edit .env.local directly. Use `npm run env:inject` to generate from .env.local.tpl via 1Password.' >&2; exit 2; fi
